page.title: 05The Games We Play.
page.content: This is how we play British Bulldog. First we all put our left or right foot into a circle. Then somebody dips and goes round the circle until they come to 'out'. The persons foot is a marker, if they land on your foot and the word is out you are on. The rest of the children go and stand in the semicircle. Then the two people who are on call a name and that person has to run to the other semicircle without being caught. If you are being chased by one of the people who are on, you can run until they catch you. They have to say "Akie one, two, three British Bulldog." If they just want to say "Akie Bulldog." that's OK. If you think somebody is caught but they say "No", they have to do a rerun. On the rerun we give the person ten seconds to get out of the semicircle.
